message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with optimal sampling strategies and distortion tradeoffs for signals, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The use of pre-sampling filters and the characterization of optimal distortion also suggest the possibility of the paper belonging to the sub-category of statistical signal processing (cs.SI). The mention of simulation results and the consideration of sparse signals suggest a possible connection to machine learning (cs.MM) and/or data analysis (cs.LG).
